name: Baby Food Pouch Brigade
materials: Baby Food Pouches; Computer (Recycling); Computer Monitors; Electronics; Laptop Computers; Printers/Scanners/Fax Machines; Small Televisions; Tablets; Televisions; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes: Every year millions of non-recyclable baby food pouches end up in our landfills. In response to this tremendous waste of resources, TerraCycle has teamed up with Ellas Kitchen to find a new use for used baby food pouches. Thanks to the generous support of Ellas Kitchen, for each approved baby food pouch received, your collection location will be awarded two TerraCycle points. These TerraCycle points can be redeemed for a variety of charitable gifts, or for a payment of $0.01 per point to the non-profit organization or school of your choice. Visit the Baby Food Pouch Brigade page to learn more."

name: Bear Naked Brigade
materials: Bear Naked Packaging; Computer (Recycling); Computer Monitors; Electronics; Laptop Computers; Printers/Scanners/Fax Machines; Small Televisions; Tablets; Televisions; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes: Every year millions of non-recyclable bags and wrappers end up in landfills. TerraCycle is committed to finding a new life for this waste by recycling Bear Naked bags, wrappers, and boxes into new unique products. Thanks to the generous support of Bear Naked, for each approved Bear Naked package received, your collection location will be awarded two TerraCycle points. These TerraCycle points can be redeemed for a variety of charitable gifts, or for a payment of $0.01 per point to the non-profit organization or school of your choice. Visit the Bear Naked Brigade page for more details."

name: BritaBrigade
materials: Brita Pitchers & Filtration; Water Filters; Computer (Recycling); Computer Monitors; Electronics; Laptop Computers; Printers/Scanners/Fax Machines; Small Televisions; Tablets; Televisions; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes: TerraCycle has teamed up with Brita to find a new use for used Brita pitchers, dispensers, bottles, faucet systems, all filters, and filter packaging. Give all of your old Brita products a second life and feel good about refreshing your pitcher, bottle, or any Brita product! Thanks to the generous support of Brita, for each pound of Brita waste received, your collection location will be awarded 50 TerraCycle points. These TerraCycle points can be redeemed for a variety of charitable gifts, or for a payment of $0.01 per point to the non-profit organization or school of your choice. Visit the Brita Brigade page for details."

name: Cell Phone Brigade
materials: Cell Phones; Computer (Recycling); Computer Monitors; Electronics; Laptop Computers; Printers/Scanners/Fax Machines; Small Televisions; Tablets; Televisions; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes: TerraCycle is proud to recycle cell phones that are needlessly discarded every year across America. The Cell Phone Brigade is a simple way to repurpose and recycle used phones while earning rewards for your organization or charity of choice. For each approved cell phone received, your collection location will be awarded TerraCycle points. Visit the Cell Phone Brigade page for details."

name: Cheese Packaging Brigade
materials: Cheese Packaging; Computer (Recycling); Computer Monitors; Electronics; Laptop Computers; Printers/Scanners/Fax Machines; Small Televisions; Tablets; Televisions; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes: Kraft Cheese has partnered with eco-innovator TerraCycle to provide a second life for cheese packaging by converting these waste materials into fun and unique products! Every time you buy a cheese product with flexible, plastic packaging (such as string cheese) you and your organization can help divert this waste from our landfills by sending it to TerraCycle. For each approved item received your collection location will be awarded two TerraCycle points, which can be redeemed for a variety of charitable gifts, or for a payment of $0.01 per point to the non-profit organization or school of your choice. Visit the Cheese Packaging Brigade page for details."

name: Cigarette Waste Brigade
materials: Cigarette Waste; Computer (Recycling); Computer Monitors; Electronics; Laptop Computers; Printers/Scanners/Fax Machines; Small Televisions; Tablets; Televisions; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes: Every year, cigarette butts end up in dumpsters and landfills, or get tossed as litter on shorelines, parks, and sidewalks across the US. With the help of Santa Fe Natural Tobacco Company, a major tobacco manufacturer in the US, the waste collected through the Cigarette Waste Brigade will be recycled into a variety of industrial products, such as plastic pallets, and any remaining tobacco will be re-worked into tobacco composting. Santa Fe Natural Tobacco Company markets their products only to smokers 21 years of age or older. If you or your participants do not smoke, or are under the age of 21, please visit our other Brigade programs to see how you can help the environment. Visit the Cigarette Waste Brigade page for details."

name: Ligonier Police Department Medication Collection Program
